abstract: A gloomy retail sales report pushed the Dow down 248 points as investors received another reminder that business was bad.
snippet: A gloomy retail sales report pushed the Dow down 248 points as investors received another reminder that business was bad.
lead_paragraph: A gloomy retail sales report pushed Wall Street sharply lower on Wednesday as investors received another reminder that business was bad.

headline.main: Stocks Tumble on Retail Sales Slump
headline.print_headline: A Sharp Drop in Retail Sales in December
